articles.title: Women’s health: How to prepare yourself for menopause - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: From eating to exercise and identifying the symptoms, here’s everything you need to know about preparing for an easier transition towards the next phase of your life, in this next instalment of CNA Women’s series on menopause.
articles.content:
In order to know if you might be perimenopausal, Dr Lim suggested looking beyond irregular periods per se, and taking note of your cycles duration and even the character of the menses. 
For example,… [+1146 chars]
